LOL, that good! I agree also, its the intentions and subconscious fears and=
 motives that are dangerous. The same spirits you would call to a board are=
 present without it.
=A0
Frank R.

I agree-Ouija' s are not dangerous. It is people's own minds that=
 are dangerous.
=A0
In other words - Ouija Boards don't kill people, people=
 kill people.
=A0

I use mine at home, in the bas=
ement, with the lights on. You don't have to go the "haunted" locations, sp=
irits and entities are everywhere, and they travel, they will come to use i=
f you announce you're doing EVP sesssions. Of course--I make my own boxes. =


I don't see how a ouija is dangerous. 

Frank-S
